DOC.brief_summary: We want compare Assisted Reproductive Technology ( ART ) outcomes two protocol induction ovulation patient Hypogonadotropic Hypogonadism . In begin , patient receive Recombinant Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( Gonal-F ) Recombinant Luteinizing Hormone ( Luveris ) . When least one follicle reach 14 mm diameter , Luveris alone administer group A drug Gonal-F Luveris group B . Finally Assisted Reproductive Technology ( ART ) result compare two group .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Assisted Reproductive Technology ( ART ) Outcomes Between Two Protocols Induction Ovulation Patients With Hypogonadotropic Hypogonadism
DOC.detailed_description: In single blind randomize clinical trial , 90 woman clinical history hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism stop treatment gonadotrophin > 1 month study , negative progesterone challenge test , low serum gonadotrophin ( Luteinizing Hormone ( LH ) Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) less 5.0 IU/l ) oestradiol ( le 100 pg/ml ) normal serum concentration thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) , testosterone prolactin within 6 month start treatment study Royan Institute . Other cause infertility exclude study . All patient receive treatment recombinant follicle stimulate hormone ( Gonal-F ) recombinant luteinizing hormone ( Luveris ) . When least one follicle reach 14 mm diameter , 4mg/day oestradiol administer patient randomly divide two group : Luveris alone ( intervention group ) continue treatment drug Gonal-F Luveris ( control group ) . When least one follicle detect mean diameter â‰¥18 mm serum estradiol level reach 500-2000 pg/ml , ovarian stimulation stop injection 10000 IU Human Chorionic Gonadotrophin ( hCG ) administrate . At end , number size ovarian follicle , endometrial thickness day injection Human Chorionic Gonadotrophin ( hCG ) , number oocyte retrieve , number good quality embryo , chemical clinical pregnancy rate , fertilization rate implantation rate compare two group .
DOC.criteria: Have clinical history hypogonadotropic hypogonadism , laboratory test result comply diagnosis hypogonadotropic hypogonadism Have discontinue gonadotropin gonadotropin release hormone estrogenprogesterone replacement therapy least one month study Have primary secondary amenorrhea Serum Luteinizing Hormone ( LH ) Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) < 5.0 IU/l oestradiol < 100 pg/ml initiation treatment Have negative progesterone challenge test Normal serum concentration thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) , prolactin testosterone within 6 month start study Be willing able comply protocol duration study Have give write informed consent prior study related procedure The cause infertility . History ovarian hyper stimulation syndrome Abnormal gynecological bleeding undetermined origin Previous current hormone dependent tumor
DOC.keyword: Gonal-F Luveris Assisted Reproductive Technology Hypogonadotropic Hypogonadism
